short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension always makes passwords visible

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of constantly having to check if you made a mistake when typing in your passwords? The "No More Dots" extension is here to help! With this extension, all password fields will be automatically displayed as plain text, making it easy to spot any typos or mistakes. Simply install the extension and all your password frustrations will disappear. Try "No More Dots" now and make your online life a little bit easier!
